data.expected_result: One menu pops up and the rest of the taps don’t do anything.
data.short_description: Mutiple menus show up when you tap “...” many times in quick succession (Could be iOS 11.3 or greater only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up Discord - Go to a fairly large server (that you didn’t start on) - Hit the “...” button many times in a quick succession
